Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local Tool = script.Parent
local Animations = {} local MyHumanoid local MyCharacter
local function PlayAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Play() else print("Can't find animation:" , animationName) end end
local function StopAnimation(animationName) if Animations[animationName] then Animations[animationName]:Stop() end end
local function ConnectAnimationToValueChange(valueName, animationName) return WaitForChild(Tool, valueName).Changed:connect( function (value) --if value then PlayAnimation(animationName) --else -- StopAnimation('SlashAnim') --end end) end
function OnEquipped(mouse) MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyHumanoid = WaitForChild(MyCharacter, 'Humanoid') if MyHumanoid then Animations['EquipAnim'] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool, 'EquipAnim')) Animations['IdleAnim'] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool, 'IdleAnim')) Animations['SwingAnim'] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool, 'SwingAnim')) Animations['ExecuteAnim'] = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(WaitForChild(Tool, 'ExecuteAnim')) end PlayAnimation('EquipAnim') PlayAnimation('IdleAnim') end
function OnUnequipped() StopAnimation('EquipAnim') StopAnimation('IdleAnim') end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
ConnectAnimationToValueChange('PlayExecute', 'ExecuteAnim')
ConnectAnimationToValueChange('PlaySwing', 'SwingAnim')

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled do wait(0.05) end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

-- SolarCrane
-- Waits for the child of the specified parent local function WaitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end
local SWORD_DAMAGE = 40 local EXECUTE_DAMAGE = 70
local PlayersService = Game:GetService('Players') local DebrisService = Game:GetService('Debris')
local ShieldConnection local ArmShieldWeld
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, 'Handle') local Shield
local AnimationTable
local SlashSound local SprintSound local SwordHitSound
local Attacking = false
local MyCharacter = Tool.Parent local MyPlayer local MyHumanoid local MyTorso
----------- CLONEABLE COFFIN INFO ------------- local Coffin = Instance.new('Part') Coffin.Size = Vector3.new(6, 2.4, 7)
--[[ local WorldToCellFunction = Workspace.Terrain.WorldToCellPreferSolid local GetCellFunction = Workspace.Terrain.GetCell --]] -----------------------------------------------
function RayIgnoreCheck(hit, pos) if hit then if hit.Transparency >= 1 or string.lower(hit.Name) == "water" or hit.Name == "Effect" or hit.Name == "Rocket" or hit.Name == "Bullet" or hit.Name == "Handle" or hit:IsDescendantOf(MyCharacter) then return true --[[ elseif hit:IsA('Terrain') and pos then local cellPos = WorldToCellFunction(Workspace.Terrain, pos) if cellPos then local cellMat = GetCellFunction(Workspace.Terrain, cellPos.x, cellPos.y, cellPos.z) if cellMat and cellMat == Enum.CellMaterial.Water then return true end end --]] end end return false end
-- @preconditions: vec should be a unit vector, and 0 < rayLength <= 1000 function RayCast(startPos, vec, rayLength) local hitObject, hitPos = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startPos + (vec * .01), vec * rayLength), Handle) if hitObject and hitPos then local distance = rayLength - (hitPos - startPos).magnitude if RayIgnoreCheck(hitObject, hitPos) and distance > 0 then -- there is a chance here for potential infinite recursion return RayCast(hitPos, vec, distance) end end return hitObject, hitPos end
local function FindHumanoidRecursive(hit) if (hit.className == Workspace) then return nil end local humanoid = hit:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if (humanoid ~= nil) then return humanoid end if (hit.Parent ~= nil) then return FindHumanoidRecursive(hit.Parent) end return nil end
local function FindMassRecursive(object) if not object then return 0 end local subMass = 0 if object:IsA('BasePart') then subMass = object:GetMass() end for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do subMass = subMass + FindMassRecursive(child) end return subMass end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) -- Add more tags here to customize what tags are available. while humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator') do humanoid:FindFirstChild('creator'):Destroy() end local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid DebrisService:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5)
local weaponIconTag = Instance.new("StringValue") weaponIconTag.Value = IconURL weaponIconTag.Name = "icon" weaponIconTag.Parent = creatorTag end
local function CreateArmWeld() if ArmShieldWeld then return end if MyCharacter and MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') then if not ShieldConnection then ShieldConnection = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Left Arm').ChildRemoved:connect(function(child) if child.Name == 'ArmWeld' then CreateArmWeld() end end) end ArmShieldWeld = Instance.new('Weld') ArmShieldWeld.Name = "ArmWeld" ArmShieldWeld.Part0 = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') ArmShieldWeld.Part1 = Shield ArmShieldWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(-90), math.rad(90), 0) ArmShieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.new() + Vector3.new(0, 0, 0.6) ArmShieldWeld.Parent = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Left Arm') Shield.Parent = Tool else print('CreateArmWeld: you have no character or no left arm.') end end
local function DestroyArmWeld() if ArmShieldWeld then ArmShieldWeld:Destroy() ArmShieldWeld = nil end if ShieldConnection then ShieldConnection:disconnect() ShieldConnection = nil end end
local function SwordUp() if Tool then Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) end end
local function SwordDown() if Tool then Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) end end
local function CreateFloatForce(objectToFloat) local floatForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') floatForce.force = (Vector3.new(0, 196.2, 0)) * FindMassRecursive(objectToFloat) return floatForce end
local function CreateKickGyro(target) if MyCharacter and MyTorso then local mass = FindMassRecursive(MyCharacter)
local lookVector = MyTorso.CFrame.lookVector local bodyGyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro') --bodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), lookVector) * CFrame.Angles(0, -math.pi/2, -math.pi/2) -- Gets you in that sideways kick pose bodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(), (target.CFrame.p - MyTorso.CFrame.p).unit:Cross(Vector3.new(0, 1, 0))) * CFrame.Angles(0,0,-math.pi/2) bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(100000, 100000, 100000) DebrisService:AddItem(bodyGyro, 2) bodyGyro.Parent = MyTorso
local origVel = (target.CFrame.p - MyTorso.CFrame.p).unit * 60 --MyTorso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, -60)) if SprintSound then SprintSound:Play() end local bf = CreateFloatForce(MyCharacter) DebrisService:AddItem(bf, 2) bf.Parent = MyTorso
local myLeftLeg = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Left Leg') local myRightLeg = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Right Leg') local leftLegConn if myLeftLeg then leftLegConn = myLeftLeg.Touched:connect( function (hit) if myLeftLeg and hit.Name == 'Torso' and hit ~= MyTorso then if Shield then local shieldWeld = Instance.new('ManualWeld') local ShieldClone = Shield:Clone() Shield.Transparency = 1 shieldWeld.Part0 = hit shieldWeld.Part1 = ShieldClone shieldWeld.Parent = ShieldClone shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 1) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) DebrisService:AddItem(ShieldClone, 3) ShieldClone.Parent = hit if ShieldClone:FindFirstChild('Mesh') then ShieldClone.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(3.5, 3.5, 3.5) end Delay(2, function() if Shield then Shield.Transparency = 0 end end) end local weld = Instance.new('ManualWeld') weld.Part0 = myLeftLeg weld.Part1 = hit weld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0.3, -1.2, -1.2)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi ,0)-- math.pi/2, 0) DebrisService:AddItem(weld, 3) weld.Parent = myLeftLeg leftLegConn:disconnect() leftLegConn = nil if bodyGyro then print('Deleting old gyro') bodyGyro:Destroy() bodyGyro = nil end print('Creating up gyro') local upBodyGyro = Instance.new('BodyGyro') upBodyGyro.Name = 'UpBodyGyro' upBodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(1000000, 1000, 1000000) upBodyGyro.P = 30000 upBodyGyro.D = 50 DebrisService:AddItem(upBodyGyro, 3) upBodyGyro.Parent = MyTorso bf.force = bf.force + origVel * (FindMassRecursive(MyCharacter) + FindMassRecursive(hit.Parent))
if AnimationTable then AnimationTable.Execute.Value = not AnimationTable.Execute.Value end
wait(0.65) SwordDown() if SlashSound then SlashSound:Play() end wait(0.35) if bf then bf:Destroy() end wait(0.7) SwordUp() --wait(2.5) if weld then weld:Destroy() end wait(0.1) if hit then local humanoid = FindHumanoidRecursive(hit) if humanoid then if SwordHitSound then SwordHitSound:Play() end humanoid:TakeDamage(EXECUTE_DAMAGE) end end end end) Delay(3, function() if leftLegConn then leftLegConn:disconnect() leftLegConn = nil end end) end local bv = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(30000, 30000, 30000) DebrisService:AddItem(bv, 3) bv.Parent = MyTorso -- this may be better as a rocket propulsion (rocket feet) for i = 1, 30 do if leftLegConn and bv then print('Setting Velocity') bv.velocity = (target.CFrame.p - MyTorso.CFrame.p).unit * 32 --MyTorso.Velocity * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)
wait(0.1) end end end end
local function CoffinAttack(character) --Handle if character:FindFirstChild('Torso') then CreateKickGyro(character.Torso) end end
function OnBlow(hit) if not Attacking then return end local humanoid = FindHumanoidRecursive(hit) if humanoid then Attacking = false if SwordHitSound then SwordHitSound:Play() end humanoid:TakeDamage(SWORD_DAMAGE) end end
function Swing() if AnimationTable then AnimationTable.Swing.Value = not AnimationTable.Swing.Value end if SlashSound then SlashSound:Play() end end
function OnActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false wait(0.1) local kicking = false local targetPart = RayCast(MyTorso.CFrame.p, (MyHumanoid.TargetPoint - MyTorso.CFrame.p).unit, 50) if targetPart then local humanoid = FindHumanoidRecursive(targetPart) if humanoid then local torso = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso and MyTorso and torso ~= MyTorso and (MyTorso.CFrame.p - torso.CFrame.p).magnitude > 8 and (MyTorso.CFrame.p - torso.CFrame.p).magnitude < 50 then CoffinAttack(humanoid.Parent) wait(2) kicking = true end end end if not kicking then Attacking = true Swing() end wait(1.2) Attacking = false --CreateKickGyro() Tool.Enabled = true end
local equipping = false function OnEquipped() if equipping then return end equipping = true MyCharacter = Tool.Parent MyPlayer = PlayersService:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter) MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') MyTorso = MyCharacter:FindFirstChild('Torso') SprintSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Sprint') SlashSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'Slash') SwordHitSound = WaitForChild(Handle, 'SwordHit') if not AnimationTable then AnimationTable = {Swing = WaitForChild(Tool, 'PlaySwing'), Execute = WaitForChild(Tool, 'PlayExecute')} end wait(0.1) Shield = Instance.new('Part') Shield.Size = Vector3.new(2.4, 5.2, 0.8) Shield.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom local shieldMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') shieldMesh.MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94752182' shieldMesh.TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=94752144' shieldMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2.3,2.3,2.3) shieldMesh.Parent = Shield Shield.Parent = Tool CreateArmWeld() equipping = false end
-- Unequip logic here function OnUnequipped() MyCharacter = nil MyHumanoid = nil MyTorso = nil MyPlayer = nil Shield:Destroy() Shield = nil DestroyArmWeld() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated) Handle.Touched:connect(OnBlow)
